contest-event.event-date:
May 10, 1930 D Ardley and Fewcott Band Contest (Section 1)
Ardley and Fewcott Band Contest (Section 1) 10 Test Piece Contest Ardley and Fewcott Band Contest ardley-and-fewcott-band-contest
None
Mignonne
Mr. White's field, Ardley 5th annual contest Prizes - 1st £6 and shield, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. We have just been awarded the Hawkes Challenge Shield with 5 names engraved but not Whetstone. It has been used as a trophy by Oxford and District Brass Band Association in this case was presented for the Adult Quartet Section at their long running Brass Festival. David Birch Shipston Town Band
Feb. 17, 2013, 10:02 a.m. Dec. 3, 2018, 5:45 p.m.
1 Whetstone Charles Moore
2 Morris Motors Band Sydney Wood
3 Northampton Borough Band Charles Albert Anderson
Unknown Result Wolverton Town Band Frank Brooks
